questions.question: The frequency of an alternator at a given RPM is determined by

answers.a: number of turns of wire in the armature coil

questions.question: Which of the following will happen to the alternator frequency if the load is removed from a turbo generator, whose governor has a 3% speed droop?
Salient pole type rotors as compared to cylindrical pole type are

answers.a: larger in diameter and smaller in axial length
answers.b: smaller in diameter as well as axial length
answers.c: larger in diameter as well as axial length
answers.d: smaller in diameter and larger in axial length

questions.question: In a synchronous machine, the field flux axis is ahead of the armature field is in the direction of rotation, the machine is working as
When a generator designed for operation at 60 Hz is operated at 50 Hz

answers.a: operating voltage must be derated to (50/60) of its original value
answers.b: operating voltage must be derated to (50/60)2 of its original value
answers.c: kVA rating can be upgraded to (60/50) of the rated value
answers.d: the generator will not take any load.
